question: Some people argue that space exploration has had more to do with national pride than international effort.To what extent do you agree with this? How do you think space exploration will change in the future?
text: Rocket science is becoming increasingly popular. A group of others, believe that the Space technology had mainly made the country pride as opposed to its Worldwide effort. This essay will discuss why and how it makes a nation prouder rather than its Global success. Additionally this essay will also provide options for how the Aerospace science will be modified later on.

To start with, technology has been flourishing by leaps and bound and provides new avenues while keeping ourselves up to date with the latest information. First and the foremost, behind every successful nation, there are great efforts of their professionals. For instance, the development in the Space technology is too much in demand globally. However, the scientist's are exploring a lot in this field and discovering a variety of phenomenal things on different Planets. For example, the chance of life on Mars was highly appreciated Internationally. Secondly, there must be a financial support by the government as well, because it needs an international aid to fulfil the Space project. Moreover, it will definitely elevate the country's reputation, including it will be helpful for the other nations.

As regards to the aerospace investigation in the future, the World is becoming more competitive. To illustrate this many regions on the Earth is working on their own to attain superpower in the World. Therefore, In my opinion, they should secretly put their efforts and finding latest information through their own investigation teams. For example, The UAE, first Astronaut did a remarkable job in the Space which leads to an example for their future generation.

In conclusion, this article discussed that how planetary research makes the country pride than its global effort. In addition, this article also discuss how the aerospace research will become the reason of competition in the near future.
